content.raw: Hello, I am currently testing the footsteplist controller and I noticed that using the right and left COP_Frames have slight offsets in the x direction. Is there another frame which can be accessed through tf which actually represents the sole frame? I'm refering to the one mentioned by the footstepdatarosmessage when it says specify origin type. The ankle one is the left & right Foot Frames which work fine. I'm stuck to using those for now.
